mapper.insert: insert into calendar (cl_num, m_id, cl_name, cl_content, cl_sdate, cl_edate, cl_group) values ((select nvl(max(cl_num),0) +1 from calendar), #{m_id}, #{cl_name}, #{cl_content}, #{cl_sdate}, #{cl_edate}, #{cl_group})
mapper.select: select cl.cl_group, cl.cl_num, cl.cl_name, cl.cl_sdate, cl.cl_edate, to_date(cl.cl_edate)-to_date(cl.cl_sdate) cl_term, cg.cl_groupname, cg.cl_color from calendar cl, calendar_group cg where cl.m_id = #{m_id} and cl.cl_group = cg.cl_group order by to_date(cl.cl_edate)-to_date(cl.cl_sdate) desc, cl.cl_num
select ca.cl_name, ca.cl_content, ca.cl_sdate, ca.cl_edate, cg.cl_groupname from calendar ca, calendar_group cg where ca.cl_num = #{cl_num} and ca.cl_group = cg.cl_group
mapper.insert: insert into calendar_group (cl_group, cl_groupname, cl_color, m_id) values ((select nvl(max(cl_group),0) +1 from calendar_group), #{cl_groupname}, #{cl_color}, #{m_id})
